body.name: DREAM PAIRS Womens Ballet Mary Jane Flats, Comfortable Business Office Dress Shoes for Women Dressy and Work with Ankle Strap
features: Water resistance level Not Water Resistant

Supportive 3D Insole: Experience unparalleled support with the 3D molded insole in these flat shoes. The insole features a breathable and moisture-absorbing surface, highly resilient memory foam, and a U-shaped heel cup for a perfect fit that alleviates the pressure on your feet.
Light & Flexible Outsole: The lightweight TPR outsole is designed with a curved, anti-slip structure, providing relief from pressure when walking.
Comfortable Lining: Enjoy the ease of slipping in and out of these women’s flats, thanks to the soft breathable inner lining.

Padded Collar: The heel area of these flats is thoughtfully designed and padded to prevent chafing and heel slippage. It also ensures a secure and comfortable fit, preventing any slipping or discomfort.
Adjustable Strap: The strap crosses over the top of your foot for extra security and adds a touch of sophistication to your every step.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable shoes
reviews.reviewText: Great fit, easy to put on and classically goes with everything. Very comfortable day shoe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars US size fits correctly on these comfortable leather look Mary Jane slip on flats
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these DREAM PAIRS shoes in a black size 11 for my wife and was pleased and relieved that it fit her so nicely. These will replace a couple of older pairs which have been great but are just too tired to look nor feel nice any longer. The slip on Mary Jane style works out best for her so I was very happy that these will fit her long and slender feet so well. Shoe shopping isn't something that I normally want to do with her on a "date night out" because shoe fitment becomes too problematic and just becomes frustrating for me. She is never thrilled with that experience either. It was with a large bit of trepidation that I even ordered these shoes for her, especially without asking her permission. I just knew that she needed new ones and this style has been the best with recent (?) acquisitions. She wears orthotics in most of her shoes now but tries to avoid doing so with her dress shoes which are worn at least weekly, and mostly for Church. She likes the Mary Jane flats style because she is the congregational organist and can play the organ with it's foot pedals without changing or removing her shoes to do so. The hook and loop fastener strap is nice in slipping these on, although it doesn't really offer much adjustability. It is simply one nice feature to enjoy as part of the whole. Her feet are quite long but also narrow and it is difficult to find shoes that fit nicely, with room for the length but which aren't loose or sloppy across her toes or in the heel. The cut on these Mary Jane's seem to fit that long slender foot quite well. These shoes are fully lined. Behind the strap the lining is a thin leather look material with a fabric heel wrap. In front of the strap the toe box is lined with a very fine weave fabric. All of the shoe and lining seams are finished smoothly, both inside and outside. I do not feel any stiff or rigid seam junctions and there is nothing that would irritate a wearers foot. The lining is smooth enough that these could be worn comfortably without stockings if desired. The molded foam insole is quite thick for this style of shoes, about 4.5mm (3/16 inch) and with a "nice lively rebound" which is what you want for good insole life and comfort. Do not be FOOLED by advertisements for memory foam in shoes. The insole is NOT the place you want low rebound memory foam. It feels great when you first touch it but after just a little use the cushion you expect it will provide your feet does not exist. It is dead to rebound, and unfortunately after just a little actual use your feet will be suffering because there is no effective cushion in that shoe. These insoles have good rebound and cushion which they should still have 6 months from now. Comfort is forever, and much better than the opposing misery. The sole of these shoes is a molded, semi-rigid TPR or rubber with a nice pattern of shallow tread groves added in. These appear to be slip resistant, at least when wet as they don't become slippery like some materials I have experienced. I am also sure that the tread design adds to the gripping ability as you sprint across the kitchen. Now that's dreaming!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These shoes are like walking on a cloud
reviews.reviewText: I love these shoes. They are so soft, flexible and comfortable. I have a few issues with my feet which can make hunting for good fitting and comfortable walking shoes a difficult find. My left foot is a bit smaller and my right ankle a bit larger because it was shattered a couple of years ago, and I was left with an ankle full of nuts, bolts, screws, plates and rods. Finding shoes that fit good and are comfortable to wear have been a challenge. These shoes fit perfectly right out of the box. That does not happen very often. I wear a 10 medium and these were perfect. I just has to bend the right one a little and stretch it a tiny bit, and it went on to fit like a glove. The sole/bed fit my feet perfectly. They were not tight and they did not rub or pinch my feel. They are so comfortable and stayed comfortable even after wearing them all day and doing quite a bit of walking. They have the traditional Mary Jane strap that comes across the top of the foot at an angle, which can be securely fastened across each foot, holding them gently but firmly in place. I must have shoes that are a good fit and do not slide around on my feet. They have to be comfortably snug but not too tight or lose. I have enough room to wiggle my toes and there are no pressure points or pinching. There is enough space at the front to allow for natural foot movement. The strap across the top of the foot is adjustable and can be cinched up or loosened as needed. This is good for me with my foot issues. I like feeling that my shoes are on, not loose on my feet and that gives me a feeling of security and stability when walking. I wore them with socks only because it is winter, and I wanted to have a nice, warm, comfy place for my feet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant Yet Comfy
reviews.reviewText: These black ballet flats, just the right fit for my teen daughter in size 6, are like a gentle hug for her feet, offering comfort as she twirls through her day. The flexible sole adds a graceful touch, allowing her to move with ease and style.Whether paired with jeans or dresses, these flats effortlessly blend with any outfit, adding a classic touch to her look. They're the reliable go-to shoes that adapt to any fashion choice with a simple charm. They are easy to put on and don't slip off her feet when she's in a hurry!For those in search of flexible, comfy footwear with a classic charm, these black ballet flats are a lovely choice for your teen's everyday adventures! I might have to get a pair for myself...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the look, the price, and the comfort
reviews.reviewText: (Size 6 regular) Love these little black flats. They're incredibly comfortable with a nicely padded inside and out. I'm a regular size six and the shoes are true to size. I wear the shoes for work most of the time. They go with everything and are so comfortable that I find myself wearing them more often than my other shoes At least so far. Taking them on and off is a breeze. The diagonal Velcro straps make it easy. Love them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not fit
reviews.reviewText: These shoes do not support my feet and they just don’t fit well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute to look at, but I’m comfortable to wear.
reviews.reviewText: These shoes were really adorable, fashion, wise, and to look at, but when putting them on, and actually wearing them, I felt like they were cutting the circulation off at my toes. The very front of the shoe digs in right, where the toes meet the base of the foot, causing constant rubbing and irritation of the skin and Foot tissue causing swelling. Although the shoe size fit perfectly, the strap did not allow for tightening any further, and the strap was extremely loose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfortable and well made
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these shoes because I wanted a pair of dress shoes that were comfortable and versatile. I really like these shoes. The bottom of the shoe is nicely padded, and the sole appears to be very durable. The velcro strap fits well and holds the shoe securely. These shoes could be worn with hose or thin socks depending on whether you are wearing a dress or dressy pants. I would definitely recommend these shoes.

These are flexible and very comfortable, with soft non-slip soles. I am a little larger than a 10, so often find I need to order an 11 (because almost no one makes a 10.5), but I really wish I had gone for the 10 in these. I have slightly narrow feet, and they fit me well in the actual width, but they are a little deeper than they need to be on my feet, so they are a bit loose with regular light socks I would normally wear in dress shoes. With thicker casual socks to take up space, they fit better. It would be nice if the strap had more room for adjustment, as that would help with the fit, but although you can make them a little looser, you don't really have room on the strap to make them tighter. Even with the thick socks, I can still slide my feet out without loosening the strap.So order to size, and if your feet are very narrow then you might need to add an insole or heel grippers. But they are really very soft and flexible, very comfortable to wear. I like them enough I'm going to add things to help them fit better, because I think these will be great office shoes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a 5 as I am usually a 4.5 UK and I couldn't even get my foot in one shoe! It is noticeably smaller than my other footwear. Returned for full refund.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect fit- very comfy and elegant
reviews.reviewText: To be honest, I was not expecting these shoes from Vine to be this pretty and comfortable.The size is a perfect fit.The shoes are made perfect and look elegant. No faults that I have noticed so far. These shoes are lightweight yet look sturdy.The insole is memory foam, and there is a U-shaped heel cup. These snug my feet perfectly and make my walking so effortless and comfortable. I have chronic foot pain and so far my experience is great with these shoes.I am wearing these to the office and they make a great pair of office wear. These go nicely with any office wear and look good with any business attire.

I'm really impressed with the quality of this shoe. The sole is strong sturdy it bendable and has non slip grip. I was desperate of a pair of comfortable shoes. Not very often do I dress up but on occasions when I do foot wear is my biggest issue. I do not find most dress shoes comfortable. These are actually pretty good. They have lovely insoles. I like that the strap across the top is adjustable as I have a very a thick wide foot. The toes have enough room, just a little pinching across the top of the foot. I chose this color as it matches my favorite purse. I am very pleased with this purchase and I'm sure that this will be my go to dress shoes

These are a basic, round toed pump, with a very slight heel.The uppers and soles are synthetic material, but the upper is made to have a leather look. Being completely synthetic makes these not very breathable, but would work well in cooler temperatures.The pair I ordered are navy blue and the colour is consistent with no void spots or variation across the pair.The soles have decent treads.The width is average to very slightly wide. The strap closure uses hook and loop, which makes them easy to close and keep on.I feel that these would work well with a skirt or dress pants. In my view, the strap makes them less dressy than a strapless shoe, but having a strap does make them stay on.For me, this shoe would likely work well for someone who needed a secure fit, with good walking treads (for a formal shoe).
